long_description: Designed to keep you connected even on the go, the Osprey Pixel daypack secures your laptop, tablet and everything else you need when you're headed out for a busy day around town. Zippered main compartment features a fleece-lined, padded laptop sleeve; fits computers up to 15 in.; laptop sleeve also features zippered tablet sleeve. Laptop compartment can also be accessed directly through a side zipper to save time. Zippered stash pocket on front flap allows quick access to items such as phone, wallet or electronics; bottom zippered compartment is designed for power cords and chargers. Zippered pocket under the flap is a great place for small items that need a little extra coverage. Zippered side expansion allows the main compartment an extra 4L of volume, from 18L to 22L. Osprey Pixel daypack features durable polyester that resists tears and stands up well to daily use.
short_description: Designed to keep you connected even on the go, the Osprey Pixel daypack secures your laptop, tablet and everything else you need when you're headed out for a busy day around town.
